mapper.insert: insert into design_templet ( design_code, design_name, user_id, design_source_type, design_style_id, space_common_id, config_file_id, evening_file_id, dawn_file_id, night_file_id, model_id, model_3d_id, web_model_u3d_id, ios_model_u3d_id, ipad_model_u3d_id, pc_model_u3d_id, android_model_u3d_id, macBookpc_model_u3d_id, pic_id, cad_pic_id, render_pic_ids, putaway_state, is_recommend, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, remark, effect_pic, effect_plan_ids, sync_status, putaway_modified, testing_modified, smallpox_identify_str, ground_identify_str ) values ( #{designCode}, #{designName}, #{userId}, #{designSourceType}, #{designStyleId}, #{spaceCommonId}, #{configFileId}, #{eveningFileId}, #{dawnFileId}, #{nightFileId}, #{modelId}, #{model3dId}, #{webModelU3dId}, #{iosModelU3dId}, #{ipadModelU3dId}, #{pcModelU3dId}, #{androidModelU3dId}, #{macBookPcModelU3dId}, #{picId}, #{cadPicId}, #{renderPicIds}, #{putawayState}, #{isRecommend}, #{sysCode}, #{creator}, #{gmtCreate}, #{modifier}, #{gmtModified}, #{isDeleted}, #{remark}, #{effectPic}, #{effectPlanIds}, #{syncStatus}, #{putawayModified}, #{testingModified}, #{smallpoxIdentify}, #{groundIdentify} )
mapper.update:
update design_templet
design_code = #{designCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
design_name = #{designName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
design_source_type = #{designSourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
design_style_id = #{designStyleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

render_pic_ids = #{renderPicIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effect_pic = #{effectPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ipad_model_u3d_id = #{ipadModelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

dawn_file_id = #{dawnFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
night_file_id = #{nightFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
putaway_state = #{putawayState,jdbcType=INTEGER},

effect_plan_ids = #{effectPlanIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sync_status = #{syncStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

space_layout_type = #{spaceLayoutType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rel_draw_id = #{relDrawId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

fix_type = #{fixType},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
